page.title: 04AN URCHFONT INDUSTRY
page.content: ONE OF THE FEW EMPLOYERS IN THE AREA IS A FIRM OF POULTRY PROCESSORS AND WHOLESALERS. FOR THE PAST 11 YEARS THIS HAS BEEN A FAMILY CONCERN EMPLOYING 8 FULL TIME MALE AND FOUR PART TIME FEMALE STAFF. TO COMPLY WITH HEALTH REGULATIONS A FULL TIME COUNCIL APPOINTED INSPECTOR IS EMPLOYED AND A VETERINARY SURGEON VISITS DAILY. POULTRY IS COLLECTED FROM FARMS IN WILTSHIRE AND SURROUNDING COUNTIES (MAINLY EX-CAGED BIRDS) BY THE FIRMS OWN TRANSPORT. UP TO 4000 BIRDS ARE PROCESSED DAILY PLUS 4-5000 TURKEYS AND 3000 CAPONS AT CHRISTMAS,THE ANNUAL TOTAL BEING 750000. 90% OF THE POULTRY IS SOLD AS NEW YORK DRESSED I.E. CLEANED AND PLUKED BUT WITH THE STOMACHS LEFT IN. THE REMAINDER IS OVEN DRESSED. THIS IS A WHOLESALE TRADE.50% TO L0NDON & 50% TO CALNE
